backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, tasks, audit logs, overtime entries, and comparison helpers for sorting tasks and history.
feature_evidence.json: Lists two frontend feature changes with affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing to role-specific dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Displays detailed overtime stats, history, and CSV export for a selected assistant.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Shows a scrollable list of assistants with overtime totals and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, user info, theme toggle, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Displays overtime totals for assistants and a team bar chart using fetched query data, with loading states and individual summary components.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Renders cumulative overtime as line or bar charts, converting dates and handling loading and empty data states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Provides a form to submit overtime entries with validation, date conversion, and success/error handling.
Shows a searchable, paginated table of overtime entries with formatted dates and time breakdowns.
Displays total overtime in days, hours, and minutes with loading skeletons and simple stat cards.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Fetches and filters audit log entries by action and search term, showing a sortable activity table with error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Displays a dialog showing a full-size preview of an evidence image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task as done, allowing optional comment and image upload with validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Shows a task’s audit history in a table with timestamps and action details, including evidence image previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Interface for selecting an assistant and managing preference levels for all tasks using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main to‑do section handling task creation, editing, completion, filtering, and sorting with multiple dialogs.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders the task list with edit, completion, pin controls, urgency indicators, and access to history and image previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Dialog component for creating or editing to‑do tasks with form state, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for user profiles, overtime, assistants, tasks, and management actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, color tokens, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Assistant dashboard page combining to‑do management and overtime tracking with tabs, summaries, forms, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication with a styled UI and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Renders the manager dashboard with tabs for tasks, team management, analytics, and audit logs, including assistant selection and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Provides a form for new assistants to create a username and choose a language, submitting registration via a mutation.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Contains helpers for computing task due dates, urgency scoring, and formatting labels based on daily, weekly, or monthly frequencies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current app-wide requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature records for the FitGebit dental-practice app. Captures state for authentication, roles, overtime tracking, a shared to‑do system, and UI/notification behaviors.
